working_on.task: Fix AGENTS.md optional download error display

recent_changes.description: Fixed installer script UI glitch for optional files.
Bumped version to 3.4.2 and updated metadata.

decisions_made.decision: Treat AGENTS.md as strictly optional in installer
decisions_made.reason: Avoid false negative error display for users
